queryAction.sqlQuery: SELECT device_id, avg(temperature) AVG_TEMP, max(temperature) MAX_TEMP, min(temperature) MIN_TEMP, avg(humidity) AVG_HUMIDTY, avg(roll) AVG_ROLL, min(roll) MIN_ROLL, max(roll) MAX_ROLL, avg(pitch) AVG_PITCH, min(pitch) MIN_PITCH, max(pitch) MAX_PITCH FROM etl_archival_store_Morad group by (device_id) order by device_id
